name: sunshine
tagline: A low latency game streaming host for Moonlight
description: Sunshine is a self-hosted game streaming host that works with Moonlight and similar clients. It captures and streams your desktop or games with low-latency encoding.

features.title: Game Streaming
features.description: Streams PC games to Moonlight clients on various devices

features.title: Low Latency
features.description: Optimizes encoding and network protocols for minimal input lag

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Leverages NVENC, AMF, or QuickSync for efficient video encoding

features.title: Hdr Support
features.description: Streams HDR content to compatible displays and clients

features.title: Multi
features.description: Streams to multiple devices simultaneously or sequentially

features.title: Controller Support
features.description: Passes through gamepad input from remote clients

features.title: Audio Streaming
features.description: Routes game audio to remote devices with low latency

features.title: Resolution Scaling
features.description: Adjusts stream resolution based on client capabilities and bandwidth
